attributes.invocation_params:
{"model": "databricks-meta-llama-3-3-70b-instruct", "target_uri": "databricks", "n": 1, "extra_params": {}, "_type": "chat-databricks", "stop": null, "tools": [{"type": "function", "function": {"name": "nimble_targeted_engines", "description": "
    Fetch lists of available Nimble Web Agent templates for targeted data extraction.

    Returns templates with: id, name, display_name, description, domain, entity_type (PDP/SERP).
    Use the 'id' field as template_number in targeted_retrieval.
    ", "parameters": {"additionalProperties": false, "properties": {"tool_reasoning": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_description": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}}, "type": "object"}}}, {"type": "function", "function": {"name": "nimble_targeted_retrieval", "description": "
    Executes data extraction using Nimble Web Agent's pre-trained templates.

    Leverages Nimble's intelligent extraction technology for accurate, structured data
    from e-commerce sites, job boards, and other supported domains.

    Args:
        input: Format depends on template entity_type:
            • SERP: Search query (e.g., "wireless headphones")  
            • PDP: Product identifier - Amazon: ASIN only ("B08N5WRWNW"), 
            Best Buy: SKU, Target: TCIN, Walmart: Item ID, Others: product ID or path
            • CLP: Category path or identifier
            
        template_number: Template ID from nimble_targeted_engines

    Check template 'domain' and 'entity_type' from nimble_targeted_engines for correct format.

    Returns:
        Structured data specific to template type. HTML content auto-filtered.
    ", "parameters": {"additionalProperties": false, "properties": {"input": {"type": "string"}, "template_number": {"type": "integer"}, "tool_reasoning": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_description": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}}, "required": ["input", "template_number"], "type": "object"}}}, {"type": "function", "function": {"name": "nimble_google_maps_search", "description": "
    Perform a Google Maps search using Nimble's SERP

    Args:
        query: Search query for Google Maps
        tool_reasoning: Optional reasoning about why this tool was selected
        tool_description: Optional description of the tool's purpose

    Returns:
        dict: Dictionary containing structured place results:
            - input_url: The URL used for the search
            - num_results: Number of places found
            - places: List of place objects with details from Google Maps
    ", "parameters": {"additionalProperties": false, "properties": {"query": {"type": "string"}, "tool_reasoning": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_description": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}}, "required": ["query"], "type": "object"}}}, {"type": "function", "function": {"name": "nimble_google_maps_reviews", "description": "
    Collect reviews for a specific place from Google Maps using Nimble's API.
    Results include detailed review content and reviewer information.

    Note: You can obtain a place_id by first using the nimble_google_maps_search tool,
    which returns place_id values that can then be used with this tool.

    Args:
        place_id: Google Maps place ID to collect reviews for
        sort_by: Sort reviews by "relevance" (default), "newest", or "highest_rating"
        tool_reasoning: Optional reasoning about why this tool was selected
        tool_description: Optional description of the tool's purpose

    Returns:
        dict: Dictionary containing structured review results:
            - place_id: The place ID used for the query
            - place_details: Basic details about the place
            - num_reviews: Number of reviews retrieved
            - reviews: List of review objects with details from Google Maps
    ", "parameters": {"additionalProperties": false, "properties": {"place_id": {"type": "string"}, "sort_by": {"default": "relevance", "type": "string"}, "tool_reasoning": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_description": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}}, "required": ["place_id"], "type": "object"}}}, {"type": "function", "function": {"name": "nimble_google_maps_place", "description": "
    Retrieve detailed, dynamic information about a place from Google Maps using Nimble's API.

    The returned result is a flexible dictionary containing all available data for the requested place.
    This can include core details such as name, address, location, contact info, ratings, categories, and links,
    as well as rich metadata like business descriptions, amenities, accessibility features, opening hours, photos,
    crowd and service information, and more.

    Note: You can obtain a place_id by first using the nimble_google_maps_search tool,
    which returns place_id values that can then be used with this tool.

    Args:
        place_id: Google Maps place ID to retrieve information for
        tool_reasoning: Optional reasoning about why this tool was selected
        tool_description: Optional description of the tool's purpose

    Returns:
        dict: A dictionary with all available information about a specific place.
    ", "parameters": {"additionalProperties": false, "properties": {"place_id": {"type": "string"}, "tool_reasoning": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_description": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}}, "required": ["place_id"], "type": "object"}}}, {"type": "function", "function": {"name": "nimble_effortless_pipelines", "description": "
    Get Nimble Effortless Pipeline definitions. 
    If item_id is provided, gets a specific definition.
    Otherwise, gets all pipeline definitions.

    Args:
        item_id: Optional ID of specific pipeline definition to retrieve
        tool_reasoning: Optional reasoning for using this tool
        tool_description: Optional description of the tool usage

    Returns:
        dict: Pipeline definitions data from Bakery API
    ", "parameters": {"additionalProperties": false, "properties": {"item_id": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_reasoning": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_description": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}}, "type": "object"}}}, {"type": "function", "function": {"name": "nimble_effortless_templates", "description": "
    Get Nimble Effortless Pipeline. 
    If item_id is provided, gets a specific template.
    Otherwise, gets all pipeline templates.

    Args:
        item_id: Optional ID of specific pipeline template to retrieve
        tool_reasoning: Optional reasoning for using this tool
        tool_description: Optional description of the tool usage

    Returns:
        dict: Pipeline templates data from Bakery API
    ", "parameters": {"additionalProperties": false, "properties": {"item_id": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_reasoning": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_description": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}}, "type": "object"}}}, {"type": "function", "function": {"name": "nimble_deep_web_search", "description": "
    Perform a web search using Nimble's Search API.

    This MCP tool allows retrieving search results from various search engines (Google, Google SGE, Bing, Yandex)
    through the Nimble API. Results are returned with page content and metadata.

    Args:
        query: The search query to execute.
        num_results: Number of search results to return. Default is 3.
        search_engine: The search engine to use. Options are "google_search" (default),
                      "google_sge", "bing_search", "yandex_search".
        parsing_type: The parsing type for content. Options are "plain_text" (default),
                     "markdown", "simplified_html".
    Returns:
        dict:
            - results (list):
                - page_content (str)
                - metadata (dict):
                    - title (str)
                    - snippet (str)
                    - url (str)
                    - position (int)
                    - entity_type (str)
    ", "parameters": {"additionalProperties": false, "properties": {"query": {"type": "string"}, "num_results": {"default": 3, "type": "integer"}, "search_engine": {"default": "google_search", "type": "string"}, "parsing_type": {"default": "plain_text", "type": "string"}, "tool_reasoning": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_description": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}}, "required": ["query"], "type": "object"}}}, {"type": "function", "function": {"name": "nimble_extract", "description": "
    Extract content from a specific URL using Nimble's Extract API.

    This MCP tool allows extracting and parsing content from a single URL
    through the Nimble API. Returns the same format as nimble_deep_web_search but for one URL.

    Args:
        url: The URL to extract content from.
        parsing_type: The parsing type for content. Options are "plain_text" (default),
                     "markdown", "simplified_html".
        tool_reasoning: Optional reasoning about why this tool was selected.
        tool_description: Optional description of the tool's purpose.

    Returns:
        dict:
            - page_content (str)
            - metadata (dict):
                - title (str)
                - snippet (str)
                - url (str)
                - position (int)
                - entity_type (str)
    ", "parameters": {"additionalProperties": false, "properties": {"url": {"type": "string"}, "parsing_type": {"default": "plain_text", "type": "string"}, "tool_reasoning": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_description": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}}, "required": ["url"], "type": "object"}}}]}

attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
{"messages": [{"content": "The cheapest round-trip flights from San Francisco to Atlanta start at $154. You can find flights from San Francisco Intl. Airport (SFO) to Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta Intl. Airport (ATL) with various airlines, including Frontier Airlines, Delta Air Lines, and United. The average flight time is 4 hours and 34 minutes, and the earliest flight from SFO to ATL is at 6:00 AM UTC-8. 

It's recommended to book your flight on a Sunday and to fly on a Thursday to get the cheapest prices. You can also save money by booking a flight and hotel package together. Additionally, consider using Expedia's Price Drop Protection and Price Tracking features to stay on top of airfares and find the best deals.

Some specific flight options include:

* Frontier Airlines: $154 round-trip, departing Sat, Aug 30, and returning Sat, Sep 6
* Frontier Airlines: $166 round-trip, departing Sat, Aug 30, and returning Sat, Sep 6
* Frontier Airlines: $178 round-trip, departing Sat, Sep 13, and returning Sat, Sep 20

Please note that prices and availability are subject to change, and it's always a good idea to compare prices and find the best deals for your specific travel dates and preferences.", "additional_kwargs": {}, "response_metadata": {"id": "chatcmpl_2a351eaf-c826-46c3-9ec7-6daf8bde73e9", "object": "chat.completion", "created": 1749493129, "model": "meta-llama-3.3-70b-instruct-121024", "usage": {"prompt_tokens": 7639, "completion_tokens": 273, "total_tokens": 7912}, "model_name": "meta-llama-3.3-70b-instruct-121024"}, "type": "ai", "name": null, "id": "run--7315e969-cf1f-49b5-949d-574b41a07cc8-0", "example": false, "tool_calls": [], "invalid_tool_calls": [], "usage_metadata": null}]}

attributes.invocation_params:
{"model": "databricks-meta-llama-3-3-70b-instruct", "target_uri": "databricks", "n": 1, "extra_params": {}, "_type": "chat-databricks", "stop": null, "tools": [{"type": "function", "function": {"name": "nimble_targeted_engines", "description": "
    Fetch lists of available Nimble Web Agent templates for targeted data extraction.

    Returns templates with: id, name, display_name, description, domain, entity_type (PDP/SERP).
    Use the 'id' field as template_number in targeted_retrieval.
    ", "parameters": {"additionalProperties": false, "properties": {"tool_reasoning": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_description": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}}, "type": "object"}}}, {"type": "function", "function": {"name": "nimble_targeted_retrieval", "description": "
    Executes data extraction using Nimble Web Agent's pre-trained templates.

    Leverages Nimble's intelligent extraction technology for accurate, structured data
    from e-commerce sites, job boards, and other supported domains.

    Args:
        input: Format depends on template entity_type:
            • SERP: Search query (e.g., "wireless headphones")  
            • PDP: Product identifier - Amazon: ASIN only ("B08N5WRWNW"), 
            Best Buy: SKU, Target: TCIN, Walmart: Item ID, Others: product ID or path
            • CLP: Category path or identifier
            
        template_number: Template ID from nimble_targeted_engines

    Check template 'domain' and 'entity_type' from nimble_targeted_engines for correct format.

    Returns:
        Structured data specific to template type. HTML content auto-filtered.
    ", "parameters": {"additionalProperties": false, "properties": {"input": {"type": "string"}, "template_number": {"type": "integer"}, "tool_reasoning": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_description": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}}, "required": ["input", "template_number"], "type": "object"}}}, {"type": "function", "function": {"name": "nimble_google_maps_search", "description": "
    Perform a Google Maps search using Nimble's SERP

    Args:
        query: Search query for Google Maps
        tool_reasoning: Optional reasoning about why this tool was selected
        tool_description: Optional description of the tool's purpose

    Returns:
        dict: Dictionary containing structured place results:
            - input_url: The URL used for the search
            - num_results: Number of places found
            - places: List of place objects with details from Google Maps
    ", "parameters": {"additionalProperties": false, "properties": {"query": {"type": "string"}, "tool_reasoning": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_description": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}}, "required": ["query"], "type": "object"}}}, {"type": "function", "function": {"name": "nimble_google_maps_reviews", "description": "
    Collect reviews for a specific place from Google Maps using Nimble's API.
    Results include detailed review content and reviewer information.

    Note: You can obtain a place_id by first using the nimble_google_maps_search tool,
    which returns place_id values that can then be used with this tool.

    Args:
        place_id: Google Maps place ID to collect reviews for
        sort_by: Sort reviews by "relevance" (default), "newest", or "highest_rating"
        tool_reasoning: Optional reasoning about why this tool was selected
        tool_description: Optional description of the tool's purpose

    Returns:
        dict: Dictionary containing structured review results:
            - place_id: The place ID used for the query
            - place_details: Basic details about the place
            - num_reviews: Number of reviews retrieved
            - reviews: List of review objects with details from Google Maps
    ", "parameters": {"additionalProperties": false, "properties": {"place_id": {"type": "string"}, "sort_by": {"default": "relevance", "type": "string"}, "tool_reasoning": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_description": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}}, "required": ["place_id"], "type": "object"}}}, {"type": "function", "function": {"name": "nimble_google_maps_place", "description": "
    Retrieve detailed, dynamic information about a place from Google Maps using Nimble's API.

    The returned result is a flexible dictionary containing all available data for the requested place.
    This can include core details such as name, address, location, contact info, ratings, categories, and links,
    as well as rich metadata like business descriptions, amenities, accessibility features, opening hours, photos,
    crowd and service information, and more.

    Note: You can obtain a place_id by first using the nimble_google_maps_search tool,
    which returns place_id values that can then be used with this tool.

    Args:
        place_id: Google Maps place ID to retrieve information for
        tool_reasoning: Optional reasoning about why this tool was selected
        tool_description: Optional description of the tool's purpose

    Returns:
        dict: A dictionary with all available information about a specific place.
    ", "parameters": {"additionalProperties": false, "properties": {"place_id": {"type": "string"}, "tool_reasoning": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_description": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}}, "required": ["place_id"], "type": "object"}}}, {"type": "function", "function": {"name": "nimble_effortless_pipelines", "description": "
    Get Nimble Effortless Pipeline definitions. 
    If item_id is provided, gets a specific definition.
    Otherwise, gets all pipeline definitions.

    Args:
        item_id: Optional ID of specific pipeline definition to retrieve
        tool_reasoning: Optional reasoning for using this tool
        tool_description: Optional description of the tool usage

    Returns:
        dict: Pipeline definitions data from Bakery API
    ", "parameters": {"additionalProperties": false, "properties": {"item_id": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_reasoning": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_description": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}}, "type": "object"}}}, {"type": "function", "function": {"name": "nimble_effortless_templates", "description": "
    Get Nimble Effortless Pipeline. 
    If item_id is provided, gets a specific template.
    Otherwise, gets all pipeline templates.

    Args:
        item_id: Optional ID of specific pipeline template to retrieve
        tool_reasoning: Optional reasoning for using this tool
        tool_description: Optional description of the tool usage

    Returns:
        dict: Pipeline templates data from Bakery API
    ", "parameters": {"additionalProperties": false, "properties": {"item_id": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_reasoning": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_description": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}}, "type": "object"}}}, {"type": "function", "function": {"name": "nimble_deep_web_search", "description": "
    Perform a web search using Nimble's Search API.

    This MCP tool allows retrieving search results from various search engines (Google, Google SGE, Bing, Yandex)
    through the Nimble API. Results are returned with page content and metadata.

    Args:
        query: The search query to execute.
        num_results: Number of search results to return. Default is 3.
        search_engine: The search engine to use. Options are "google_search" (default),
                      "google_sge", "bing_search", "yandex_search".
        parsing_type: The parsing type for content. Options are "plain_text" (default),
                     "markdown", "simplified_html".
    Returns:
        dict:
            - results (list):
                - page_content (str)
                - metadata (dict):
                    - title (str)
                    - snippet (str)
                    - url (str)
                    - position (int)
                    - entity_type (str)
    ", "parameters": {"additionalProperties": false, "properties": {"query": {"type": "string"}, "num_results": {"default": 3, "type": "integer"}, "search_engine": {"default": "google_search", "type": "string"}, "parsing_type": {"default": "plain_text", "type": "string"}, "tool_reasoning": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_description": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}}, "required": ["query"], "type": "object"}}}, {"type": "function", "function": {"name": "nimble_extract", "description": "
    Extract content from a specific URL using Nimble's Extract API.

    This MCP tool allows extracting and parsing content from a single URL
    through the Nimble API. Returns the same format as nimble_deep_web_search but for one URL.

    Args:
        url: The URL to extract content from.
        parsing_type: The parsing type for content. Options are "plain_text" (default),
                     "markdown", "simplified_html".
        tool_reasoning: Optional reasoning about why this tool was selected.
        tool_description: Optional description of the tool's purpose.

    Returns:
        dict:
            - page_content (str)
            - metadata (dict):
                - title (str)
                - snippet (str)
                - url (str)
                - position (int)
                - entity_type (str)
    ", "parameters": {"additionalProperties": false, "properties": {"url": {"type": "string"}, "parsing_type": {"default": "plain_text", "type": "string"}, "tool_reasoning": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}, "tool_description": {"anyOf": [{"type": "string"}, {"type": "null"}], "default": null}}, "required": ["url"], "type": "object"}}}]}

attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
{"generations": [[{"generation_info": {}, "type": "ChatGeneration", "message": {"content": "The cheapest round-trip flights from San Francisco to Atlanta start at $154. You can find flights from San Francisco Intl. Airport (SFO) to Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta Intl. Airport (ATL) with various airlines, including Frontier Airlines, Delta Air Lines, and United. The average flight time is 4 hours and 34 minutes, and the earliest flight from SFO to ATL is at 6:00 AM UTC-8. 

It's recommended to book your flight on a Sunday and to fly on a Thursday to get the cheapest prices. You can also save money by booking a flight and hotel package together. Additionally, consider using Expedia's Price Drop Protection and Price Tracking features to stay on top of airfares and find the best deals.

Some specific flight options include:

* Frontier Airlines: $154 round-trip, departing Sat, Aug 30, and returning Sat, Sep 6
